thread.title: Rep. James Buskey bill pops cork on sidewalk wine and beer sales in downtown Mobile
thread.title_full: Rep. James Buskey bill pops cork on sidewalk wine and beer sales in downtown Mobile

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Rep. James Buskey bill pops cork on sidewalk wine and beer sales in downtown Mobile
text: Legislation introduced by State Rep. James Buskey clarifies concerns among downtown Mobile's restaurant owners regarding ABC enforcement of sidewalk beer and wine purchases within the city's two downtown entertainment districts.
